10.text: No. LAD-NRO/GN/2011-12/29/36772─In exercise of the powers conferred by section 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India Act, 1992 (15 of 1992) the Securities and Exchange Board of India hereby makes the following regulations, namely: -

14.text: These regulations may be called the Securities and Exchange Board of India {KYC (Know Your Client) REGISTRATION AGENCY} Regulations, 2011.

15.text: They shall come into force on the date of their publication in the Official Gazette.

113.text: Functions and obligations of the KRA
nounChunks: Functions and obligations of the KRA

114.text: 5. The KRA has the following functions and obligations –

115.text: KRA may prepare the Operating Instructions in co-ordination with other KRA(s) and issue the same to implement the requirements of these regulations.
nounChunks: the Operating Instructions in co-ordination with other KRA(s

116.text: KRA(s) shall have electronic connectivity and with other KRA(s) in order to establish inter- operability among KRAs.
nounChunks: order to establish inter- operability among KRAs

117.text: Explanation: Inter-operability means the ability of the KRA to determine whether the KYC documents of the client are in the custody of another KRA.
nounChunks: the ability of the KRA to determine whether the KYC documents of the client are in the custody of another KRA
the KYC documents of the client

118.text: KRA shall have a secure data transmission link with other KRA(s) and with each intermediary that uploads the KYC documents on its system and relies upon its data.
nounChunks: each intermediary that uploads the KYC documents on its system and relies upon its data
a secure data transmission link with other KRA(s

119.text: KRA shall be responsible for storing, safeguarding and retrieving the KYC documents and submit to the Board or any other statutory authority as and when required.
nounChunks: the Board or any other statutory authority

120.text: KRA shall retain the 12[] KYC documents of the client, in 13[] electronic form for the period specified by Rules, as well as ensuring that retrieval of KYC information is facilitated within stipulated time period.
nounChunks: ] electronic form for the period specified by Rules,
the 12[] KYC documents of the client

121.text: Any information updated about a client shall be disseminated by KRA to all intermediaries that avail of the services of the KRA in respect of that client.
nounChunks: Any information updated about a client
all intermediaries that avail of the services of the KRA in respect of that client

122.text: KRA shall ensure that the integrity of the automatic data processing systems for electronic records is maintained at all times.
nounChunks: the integrity of the automatic data processing systems for electronic records
the automatic data processing systems for electronic records

123.text: KRA shall take all precautions necessary to ensure that the KYC documents/records are not lost, destroyed or tampered with and that sufficient back up of electronic records is available at all times at a different place.

124.text: KRA shall have adequate mechanisms for the purposes of reviewing, monitoring and evaluating its controls, systems, procedures and safeguards.
nounChunks: its controls, systems, procedures and safeguards
the purposes of reviewing, monitoring and evaluating its controls, systems, procedures and safeguards

125.text: KRA shall cause an audit of its controls, systems, procedures and safeguards to be carried out periodically and take corrective actions for deficiencies, if any and report to Board.
nounChunks: an audit of its controls, systems, procedures and safeguards
its controls, systems, procedures and safeguards

126.text: KRA shall take all reasonable measures to prevent unauthorized access to its database and have audit of its systems and procedures at regular intervals as prescribed by the
nounChunks: all reasonable measures to prevent unauthorized access to its database and have audit of its systems and procedures at regular intervals as prescribed by the
audit of its systems and procedures

128.text: KRA shall have checks built in its system so that an intermediary can access the information only for the clients who approach him.

129.text: KRA shall appoint a compliance officer who shall be responsible for monitoring the compliance of the Act, rules and regulations, notifications, guidelines, instructions, etc., issued by the Board or the Central Government and for redressal of client’s grievances. The compliance officer shall immediately and independently report to the Board any non-compliance observed by him.
ents: the Board or the Central Government
nounChunks: the Act, rules and regulations, notifications, guidelines, instructions, etc.
rules and regulations, notifications, guidelines, instructions, etc.

a compliance officer who shall be responsible for monitoring the compliance of the Act, rules and regulations, notifications, guidelines, instructions, etc., issued by the Board or the Central Government
the Board or the Central Government
the compliance of the Act, rules and regulations, notifications, guidelines, instructions, etc.
cleanedUpEnts: the Board or the Central Government

130.text: KRA shall send a letter to each client after receipt of the KYC documents from the intermediary, confirming the client’s details thereof.
nounChunks: receipt of the KYC documents from the intermediary

131.text: KRA shall take adequate steps for redressal of the grievances of the clients within one month of the date of receipt of the complaint and keep the Board informed about the number, nature and other particulars of the complaints from such investors.

306.text: A KRA shall make all efforts to protect the interest of its clients.
nounChunks: all efforts to protect the interest of its clients

307.text: A KRA shall maintain high standards of integrity, dignity and fairness in the conduct of its business.
nounChunks: high standards of integrity, dignity and fairness

308.text: A KRA shall fulfill its obligations in a prompt, ethical and professional manner.
nounChunks: a prompt, ethical and professional manner

309.text: A KRA shall at all times exercise due diligence, ensure proper care and exercise independent professional judgment.

310.text: 4The words “initial and permanent” omitted by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Change In Conditions Of Registration Of Certain Intermediaries) (Amendment) Regulations, 2016 w.e.f. 08-12-2016.

312.text: A KRA shall ensure that any change in registration status/any penal action taken by Board or any material change in financial position which may adversely affect the interests of clients is promptly displayed on its website.
nounChunks: any material change in financial position
any penal action taken by Board or any material change in financial position which may adversely affect the interests of clients
any change in registration status/any penal action taken by Board or any material change in financial position which may adversely affect the interests of clients

313.text: A KRA shall not divulge to anybody either orally or in writing, directly or indirectly, any confidential information about the clients which has come to its knowledge, without taking prior permission of its clients, except where such disclosures are required to be made in compliance with any law for the time being in force.
nounChunks: any confidential information about the clients which has come to its knowledge, without taking prior permission of its clients, except where such disclosures are required to be made in compliance with any law for the time being in force
the clients which has come to its knowledge
any law for the time being in force
compliance with any law for the time being in force

314.text: A KRA shall not indulge in any unfair competition.

315.text: A KRA shall display on its website adequate and appropriate information about its business, including contact details of persons and services available to clients.
nounChunks: contact details of persons and services available to clients
adequate and appropriate information about its business, including contact details of persons and services available to clients

316.text: A KRA shall ensure that grievances of clients are redressed in a timely and appropriate manner;

317.text: 0.A KRA shall make reasonable efforts to avoid misrepresentation and ensure that the information provided to the clients and intermediaries is not misleading.
nounChunks: the information provided to the clients and intermediaries
reasonable efforts to avoid misrepresentation and ensure that the information provided to the clients and intermediaries is not misleading

318.text: 1.A KRA shall abide by the provisions of the Act and the rules, regulations issued by the Government and the Board, from time to time, as may be applicable.
nounChunks: the provisions of the Act and the rules

319.text: 2.A KRA shall not make untrue statement or suppress any material fact in any documents, reports, papers or information furnished to the Board.
nounChunks: reports, papers or information furnished to the Board
papers or information furnished to the Board

320.text: 3.A KRA shall ensure that the Board is promptly informed about any action, legal proceeding, etc., initiated against it in respect of any material breach or non-compliance by it, of any law, rules, regulations and directions of the Board or of any other regulatory body.
nounChunks: respect of any material breach or non-compliance by it
any material breach or non-compliance by it
any law, rules, regulations and directions of the Board or of any other regulatory body

any action, legal proceeding, etc., initiated against it in respect of any material breach or non-compliance by it, of any law, rules, regulations and directions of the Board or of any other regulatory body

321.text: A KRA or any of his employees shall not render, directly or indirectly, any investment advice about any security in the publicly accessible media.
nounChunks: any security in the publicly accessible media
any investment advice about any security in the publicly accessible media
A KRA or any of his employees

322.text: A KRA shall not make a recommendation to any client who might be expected to rely thereon to acquire, dispose of or retain any securities.
nounChunks: a recommendation to any client who might be expected to rely thereon to acquire,
any client who might be expected to rely thereon to acquire,

323.text: 5.A KRA shall ensure that any person it employs or appoints to conduct business is fit and proper and otherwise qualified to act, in the capacity so employed or appointed including having relevant professional training or experience.
nounChunks: any person it employs or appoints to conduct business

324.text: 6.A KRA shall have internal control procedures and financial and operational capabilities which can be reasonably expected to protect its operations, its clients from financial loss arising from theft, fraud, and other dishonest acts, professional misconduct or omissions.
nounChunks: its clients from financial loss arising from theft, fraud, and other dishonest acts, professional misconduct or omissions
theft, fraud, and other dishonest acts, professional misconduct or omissions
other dishonest acts, professional misconduct or omissions

325.text: 7.A KRA shall be responsible for the acts or omissions of its employees in respect to the conduct of its business.
nounChunks: the acts or omissions of its employees
respect to the conduct of its business

326.text: 8.A KRA shall provide adequate freedom and powers to its compliance officer for the effective discharge of its duties.
nounChunks: the effective discharge of its duties

327.text: 9.A KRA shall ensure that the senior management, particularly decision makers have access to all relevant information about the business on a timely basis.
nounChunks: access to all relevant information about the business
all relevant information about the business
the senior management, particularly decision makers

328.text: 0.A KRA shall ensure that good corporate policies and corporate governance are in place.
nounChunks: good corporate policies and corporate governance

329.text: 1.A KRA should have adequately trained staff and arrangements to render fair, prompt and competence services to its clients.

330.text: 2.A KRA shall develop its own internal code of conduct for governing its internal operations and laying down its standards of appropriate conduct for its employees and officers in the carrying out of their duties. Such a code may extend to the maintenance of professional excellence and standards, integrity, confidentiality, objectivity, avoidance of conflict of interests, disclosure of shareholdings and interests, etc.
nounChunks: appropriate conduct for its employees and officers
avoidance of conflict of interests, disclosure of shareholdings and interests, etc
the maintenance of professional excellence and standards, integrity, confidentiality, objectivity, avoidance of conflict of interests, disclosure of shareholdings and interests, etc

its standards of appropriate conduct for its employees and officers
objectivity, avoidance of conflict of interests, disclosure of shareholdings and interests, etc

disclosure of shareholdings and interests, etc

331.text: 3.A KRA shall not be party to—

334.text: passing of unpublished price sensitive information in respect of securities which are listed and proposed to be listed in any stock exchange to any person or intermediary.
nounChunks: securities which are listed and proposed to be listed in any stock exchange to any person or intermediary
respect of securities which are listed and proposed to be listed in any stock exchange to any person or intermediary

335.text: 4.A KRA shall maintain proper inward and outward system for all types of mail received and dispatched in all forms.
nounChunks: proper inward and outward system for all types of mail

336.text: 5.A KRA shall follow maker-checker concept in its activities to ensure accuracy of data.
nounChunks: maker-checker concept in its activities to ensure accuracy of data

337.text: 6.A KRA shall not indulge in manipulative, fraudulent practices in the process of identification, verification and updation of a Client’s KYC information with a view to distort market equilibrium or making personal gains.
